plot outline: 'Padmini' is a biopic on the life and times of T.K. Padmini, touted as a prospect of Indian art in the 1960s. Her demise at the age of 29 left behind a legacy of 200-odd paintings and sketches. The movie attempts to draw the veil of time on her art and put them in context to today's audience.
